name: countries
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geodb_cities.
Tool description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
API description: Fetches a list of countries, filtered by the provided optional criteria. If no criteria are set, all known countries are returned.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

offset.description: The zero-based offset index into the results.

sort.description: How to sort the results. Format: Â±SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = code | name.

nameprefixdefaultlangresults.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested

nameprefix.description: Only countries whose names start with this prefix. If languagecode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.
